interface.name: io_elementary_pantheon_shell_v1

description.summary: create panel, widget and get more control

interface.description: This interface is used by the Pantheon Wayland shell to communicate with the compositor.

request.name: get_panel

description.summary: create a panel surface from a surface

request.description: Create a panel surface from an existing surface.

request.name: get_widget

description.summary: create a widget surface from a surface

request.description: Create a desktop widget surface from an existing surface.

request.name: get_extended_behavior

description.summary: create a desktop-specific surface from a surface

request.description: Create a desktop-specific surface from an existing surface.

enum.name: anchor
enum.description: The anchor is a placement hint to the compositor.

entry.name: top
entry.summary: the top edge of the screen

entry.name: bottom
entry.summary: the bottom edge of the screen

entry.name: left
entry.summary: the left edge of the screen

entry.name: right
entry.summary: the right edge of the screen

request.name: set_anchor
request.description: Tell the shell which side of the screen the panel is located. This is so that new windows do not overlap the panel and maximized windows maximize properly.

request.name: set_keep_above
request.description: Tell the shell to keep the surface above on all workspaces
